refund_amount.description: Amount to be refunded in case of a dispute resolution in favor of the customer

domain.description: The domain involved in the transaction leading to the dispute

transaction.description: Details of the original transaction associated with the dispute

transaction_reference.description: Reference code for the original transaction

customer.description: Details of the customer involved in the dispute

bin.description: The BIN (Bank Identification Number) associated with the payment method used

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the payment method used in the transaction

dueAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the dispute is due for resolution

resolvedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the dispute was resolved

evidence.description: Any evidence provided to support the dispute

attachments.description: Any relevant attachments or evidence related to the dispute

note.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the dispute

history.description: History of the dispute resolution process

status.description: Status of the action taken in the dispute resolution process

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the action was taken

messages.description: Messages exchanged during the dispute resolution process

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent
Timestamp indicating when the dispute was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the dispute information was last updated
